objects.name: Analytic 0190
objects.description: Detection of phishing through anomalous Mail app activity, such as attachments saved to disk and immediately executed, or Safari/Preview launching URLs and files linked from email messages. Correlate UnifiedLogs events with subsequent process execution.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Inbound email activity with suspicious domains or mismatched sender information

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Preview.app, Safari.app, or Mail.app spawning new processes outside normal patterns

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of domains known for phishing activity or suspicious sender infrastructure.
Time threshold between file save and execution considered suspicious.
